channel.title: Just an Idea
channel.description:
IF a new bot gets kicked off, similar to Aryan in function (no need to have it visable/ dosn't take over your mouse) would it be a good idea to have a sort of system where users get paid to run a program which autos on a character and you get say 50% of the procedes???
The bot would have to be locked in so you can't get the user/pass and control it to drop all the ess, but suposing it is OK here, would it work???
Discuss it here - just an idea - what do you think????

item.title: Just an Idea
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
